method.text: Heat the oil in a non-stick frying pan. Add onion, garlic and ginger and fry for 2-3 min stirring constantly until softened.
Add salmon fillets and wine to the pan. Bring to just below boiling point and simmer gently for 5-8 min, basting the salmon constantly with the wine, until the fish is cooked and flakes easily.
Remove salmon from the pan. Arrange on warmed serving plates and keep warm.
Stir the parsley and cream into the cooking liquor. Heat through gently for 1-2 min until well mixed and hot.
Pour the sauce over the salmon and serve immediately.
